src:
Trinkijeri: Izuzetno važna pobeda
02 Nov 2019, 22:33 by Darko
Trener Partizana Andrea Trinkijeri ocenio je posle trijumfa nad FMP-om u 5. kolu ABA lige da je njegov tim ostvario vrlo važnu pobedu.
– Izuzetno teška utakmica. Jedna ekipa je bila sveža, pogodila je sve, a druga se motala po terenu sa onim što smo imali od energije. Nismo dobro igrali, ali smo napravili ono što je trebalo da dobijemo ovu utakmicu. FMP je igrao izvanredno, bili su efikasni, a mi smo povremeno sami sebi komplikovali život. Ovo nije izgledalo dobro, ali je izuzetno važna pobeda i danas nisam mogao više da tražim od igrača. Jedva čekam pauzu u Evrokupu da možemo da treniramo, jer posle utakmice sa Limožom smo imali samo 25 minuta treninga. Ekipa ima ogromnu potrebu da trenira, ali nema vremena, rekao je Trinkijeri.
Italijanski stručnjak nije želeo da govori o novom pojačanju crno-belih Džejmsu Belu, a precizirao je da se Volden oporavlja od povrede, dok Parahovski nije igrao iz taktičkih razloga.
Vladimir Jovanović, trener FMP-a je čestitao Partizanu na pobedi i ocenio da su izgubljene lopte presudile njegovom timu
– Imali smo prazan hod sredinom i krajem treće četvrtine i to nas je možda koštalo rezultata. Imali smo plan da što duže budemo u igri i na kraju su jedna ili dve lopte odlučile. Imali smo mnogo izgubljenih lopti, od kojih su neke bile izuzetno važne. U drugom poluvremenu smo primili mnogo lakih koševa, što nije karakteristično za nas. Često nismo dobro komunicirali i u tim detaljima moramo još dosta da napredujemo, istakao je Jovanović.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Trinkies: An extremely important win
02 Nov 2019, 21:33 by Darko
Partizan coach Andrea Trinkiere said after his triumph over FMP in the 5th round of the ABA League that his team achieved a very important victory.
- Extremely difficult match. One team was fresh, it hit everyone, and the other was wandering around the field with what we had from energy. We didn't play well, but we did what we needed to get this game. FMP played extraordinarily, they were effective, and we occasionally made our lives complicated. This didn't look good, but it was an extremely important win and I couldn't ask for more players today. I can't wait for the Euro Cup break so we can train, because after the game with Limoges we only had 25 minutes of training. The team has a tremendous need to train, but no time, Trinkieri said.
The Italian expert did not want to talk about the new reinforcement of black and white to James Bell, specifying that Volden was recovering from injury while Parahovski did not play for tactical reasons.
Vladimir Jovanovic, FMP coach congratulated Partizan on the victory and said the lost balls were crucial to his team
- We had an idle mid and late third quarter and that may have cost us the results. We had a plan to stay in the game for as long as possible and eventually one or two balls decided. We had many lost balls, some of which were extremely important. In the second half we received a lot of light points, which is not typical for us. Often we did not communicate well and in those details we still have a lot to go on, Jovanovic said.
